entries.content: He Makes Me Believe He's Mine: New DESOR assigned take -1 to 4729f and take -2 to 4729j, identified as the issued take. Steven Lasker owns a 78 rpm test pressing containing the issued take, marked -1B. Therefore 4729j should be identified as take -1 and, consequently, unissued 4729f as take -2.
